languages.text: "У всего, к чему вы, друкари, прикасаетесь, возникает дерьмовый привкус. Даже у побед".
"Everything you Drukhari touch stinks of shit, even victories."
languages.original_text: "У всего, к чему вы, друкари, прикасаетесь, возникает дерьмовый привкус. Даже у побед".

traits.locale_text: "Everything you Drukhari touch stinks of shit, even victories."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything you Drukhari touch stinks of shit, even victories."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything you Drukhari touch stinks of shit, even victories."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Everything you Drukhari touch stinks of shit, even victories."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “所有被你们黑暗灵族摸过的东西都会有股屎臭味。哪怕是胜利，被你们摸过之后也一样臭不可闻。”
languages.original_text: "Everything you Drukhari touch stinks of shit, even victories."

traits.locale_text: “所有被你们黑暗灵族摸过的东西都会有股屎臭味。哪怕是胜利，被你们摸过之后也一样臭不可闻。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Tout ce que les Drukharis touchent pue la merde. Même les victoires. »
languages.original_text: "Everything you Drukhari touch stinks of shit, even victories."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce que les Drukharis touchent pue la merde. Même les victoires. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Los Drukhari convertís todo lo que tocáis en mierda. Hasta las victorias».
languages.original_text: "Everything you Drukhari touch stinks of shit, even victories."

traits.locale_text: «Los Drukhari convertís todo lo que tocáis en mierda. Hasta las victorias».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「アンタらデュカーリが触るとなんでもクソの臭いがするよ、勝利さえね」
languages.original_text: "Everything you Drukhari touch stinks of shit, even victories."

traits.locale_text: 「アンタらデュカーリが触るとなんでもクソの臭いがするよ、勝利さえね」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Alles, was Ihr Drukhari anfasst, stinkt nach Scheiße, selbst Eure Siege."
languages.original_text: "Everything you Drukhari touch stinks of shit, even victories."

traits.locale_text: "Alles, was Ihr Drukhari anfasst, stinkt nach Scheiße, selbst Eure Siege."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "Everything you Drukhari touch stinks of shit, even victories."

languages.text: "Siz Drukharilerin karıştığı her şey bok gibi kokuyor, zaferler bile."
languages.original_text: "Everything you Drukhari touch stinks of shit, even victories."

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari'nin dokunduğu her şey bok gibi kokuyor, zaferler bile."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
